Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: vangmee
Reviews.Content: I just got this on Monday and was soo excited to try it out! I tried it right away and it was awsome! Can;t wait to take more pictures with it! The seller responded to all my emails and i will absolutely buy from this seller again!

Reviews.Title: very good camera
Reviews.Author: Janek
Reviews.Content: very good camera kit but I couldn't put both lenses to sony case, using it you can take very various photos by different programms.

Reviews.Title: fantastic
Reviews.Author: Eloir Carli Junior
Reviews.Content: Very good product and look very Nice. The cost is good and ship is very fast If you are looking for The kit like this go ahead

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 14 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Sony Alpha NEX-6 Digital Camera Body & 16-50mm Lens (Black) + <2> Sony NEX E 55-210mm Lens + <3> Sony LCS-U20 Soft Camera Case +
<4> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card + <5> Spare NP-FW50 Battery + <6> Zeikos 50" Compact Tripod +
<7> .45x Wide & 2.5x Tele Lens + <8> Sunpak 40.5mm UV Glass Filter + <9> Vivitar 49mm UV Glass Filter + <10> Shutter Remote Control +
<11> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <12> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <13> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <14> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Alpha NEX-6 Digital Camera Body & 16-50mm Lens (Black) with E 55-210mm Lens + 64GB Card + Battery + Case + Filters + Tripod + Tele/Wide Lenses + Accessory Kit
